text: Columbus RFC is an American rugby team based in Columbus, Ohio. The flagship team plays in the Midwest Rugby Premiership with an additional team playing in Division III. ==History== The club was founded in 1975 as the Scioto Valley RFC. ==Notable former players== * Perry Baker * Steve Finkel * Andy McGarry * Eric Parthmore * Rich Schurfeld * Gary Wilson ==External links== *Columbus RFC Category:American rugby union teams Category:Rugby clubs established in 1975 Category:Sports teams in Columbus, Ohio
title: Columbus RFC (Ohio)
